title: Plat Mid main looking for team serious or for fun.
body: Hey all mid main here looking for a team or just people to play with. I want to have some fun and talk to people while playing this game. I'm available a good range of times and located in the east coast. Can play a whole bunch of champs mid also I have all champs. My main is {{champion:245}} , but can also play {{champion:99}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:3}}  and many more. been playing since season 2 and I am 26 years old so looking for players at least over 18 preferably over 21. just leave a message here or add me LeftyRaydy. Look forward to meeting you.
